summary: Compatibility patches for Requiem and several quest mods.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#e69138][size=3][i][size=5]Compatibility patches for Requiem and :[/size]
[/i][/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=4][i] 1) Interesting NPCs v 3.15[/i][/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=4][i]
[i] 2) Wyrmstooth v 1.16[/i]
[/i][/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=4][i] [/i][/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=4][i][i]3) Falskaar v 1.2.0.1[/i][/i][/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=4][i]
[color=#e69138][size=4][i][i] 4) Undeath v 1.3[/i][/i][/size][/color]
 5) [/i][/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=4][i]DLC02 -Dragonborn[/i][/size][/color]
[color=#e69138][size=3][i][b][size=3][i]
[/i][/size][/b][/i][/size][/color][color=#e69138][size=4][i]Dragonborn - Requiem[/i][/size][/color]
Almost all actors will have static level
Almost all actors will have appropriate perks and stats
DLC02 crafting, tempering, cooking recipes were modified to fit Requiem
DLC02 potions, alcohol drinks, ingridients were modified to fit Requiem
DLC02 leveled lists were modified to fit Requiem
Some of the DLC02 armour/weapons/ammo stats were modified to fit Requiem
Some of the DLC02 spells were modified to fit Requiem
Archmage robe enchantment was remade [i](removed all non-magic bonuses, added a chance to absorb spell)[/i]
Effectiveness of the [i]"Atronach "[/i] perk was reduced [i](due to the changes in the Archmage robe enchantment)
[/i][color=#B45F06]
[color=#f9cb9c][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/color][/color]
=============
1) Skyrim.esm
2) Update.esm
3) Dawnguard.esm
4) Dragonborn.esm
5) Requiem.esp


[color=#e69138][size=3][i][size=3][i][size=4]Wyrmstooth[color=#e69138][i] - Requiem[/i][/color][/size][/i][/size][/i][/size][/color]
So what this patch does? Practically the same things as Azirok's variant, but with certain improvements:
No dependence on [b][i]Requiem - Resources.esp[/i][/b]
Changed - effects of the Soln, Iceholm Ichor, Greef
Changed - perks, stats, equipment of many actors [i](requified marauders, propper perks/stats for the most of the named charcters, etc)[/i]
Changed - cost of the WT conjuration spells.

[color=#f9cb9c][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/color]
=============
1) Skyrim.esm
2) Update.esm
3) Dawnguard.esm
4) Wyrmstooth.esp
5) Requiem.esp


[color=#e69138][size=3][i][size=3][i][size=4]3DNPC[color=#e69138][i] - Requiem[/i][/color][/size][/i][/size][/i][/size][/color]
Compatibility patch for [b]Interesting NPCs[/b] [i]by Kris Takahashi[/i]([color=#fce5cd]v 3.15 HF[/color]) and Requiem
[color=#f9cb9c][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/color]
=============
1) Skyrim.esm
2) Update.esm
3) Dawnguard.esm
4) HearthFires.esm
5) 3DNPC.esp
6) Requiem.esp

[color=#e69138][size=3][i][size=3][i][size=4]Undeath[color=#e69138][i] - Requiem[/i][/color][/size][/i][/size][/i][/size][/color]
Compatibility patch for [b]Undeath[/b] [i]by Antioch08[/i] and Requiem
[color=#f9cb9c][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/color]
=============
1) Skyrim.esm
2) Update.esm
3) Dawnguard.esm
4) Dragonborn.esm
5) Undeath.esp
6) Requiem.esp


[size=4][color=#e69138][i][i]Falskaar[color=#e69138][i] - Requiem[/i][/color][/i][/i][/color][/size]
So what this patch does? Practically the same things as Azirok's variant.
Altered Falskaar content:
actors -perks, stats, equipment, class [i](named characters, bandits, guards, nercomancers)[/i]
alcohol drinks, food - effects [i](magnitude, duration, etc)[/i]
lvl lists - requified
weapons/armour- few changes in stats and weight

[color=#f9cb9c][i][b]Requirements:[/b][/i][/color]
=============
1) Skyrim.esm
2) Update.esm
3) Dawnguard.esm
4) Falskaar.esm
5) Requiem.esp


[color=#e69138][b][i][size=3]Installation:[/size][/i][/b][/color]
===============
1) Download and unpack archive  ([i]...\steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data[/i])
2) Set right load order
[color=#f6b26b]3) Activate this patch !!![/color] [i](A SkyProc patch is a Skyrim plugin which is generated automatically from the content [color=#ffff00]found in your load order[/color] )[/i]
3) Generate a SkyProc patch  ([i] ...\steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\data\skyproc patchers\requiem\reqtificator.jar[/i])
author: Nerimir
